EmailTemplate.description: Template to notify stakeholders on reception of a new EDS Alert
EmailTemplate.name: EDS Alert Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Notice of EDS Alert for Agent ##IATA_CODE## in ##COUNTRY##
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is to inform you that according to our Early Detection monitoring activities, we have detected that ##AGENT_NAME## - ##IATA_CODE## has breached ##TRIGGERED_RULES##.
The agent current standing is:
##RULES_LIST##
The current RHC Consumed amount in USD is ##OPEN_CASH_POSITION##. A case has been created to initiate an investigation and determine further actions.
